content.detailedDescription: Was shown what i think is what we know as the "ark" and showed me what it is and what it is made of and how to build it!! but i need help i don't have the means to do so!
content.summary: A dream

content.detailedDescription: Just on the edge of independence mo is land patrolled by jackson county. the neighborhood of blue mills and the adjacent neighborhood have no street lights so star gazing is good. my buddy and i are laying in his front yard around 2 in the morning and he nudges me and asks do you see that moving light. i spotted it right away as it was the only thing moving in the sky. i thought if must be the space station. then the light(from our point of reference looked like a star in the sky) started moving. it would travel one direction for about a second. then another direction for about a second. then again and again. changing directions every time it stopped, between each shift it would shake as if it were calibrating resonance or something. eventually it shot off between the stars and never to be seen that night again. another experience that will be with me forever.
content.summary: Laying on the ground watching the stars .... one started to move in multiple directions.

content.detailedDescription: 1985 or '86. myself and some neighborhood friends were playing hacky sack on the street in front of my house. i was facing west when i noticed what looked like a launch of what could be the space shuttle. everybody looked and was uninterested in the event. there was a definite ignition source coming from the tail end, looked like a rocket of some sort. wasn't until later in life that i realized that nothing in missouri between independence and kansas city would be launching something that was potentially volatile. later in life (in my later 20's) i was telling this event to my best friend and he collaborated the story with his own encounter west of my house around the same time period of an object hovering in the sky that he claims was the size of a small town. they drove the streets under it trying to find the edges to try and identify it, to no avail, it launched upward with a glowing emission from the tail, which i believe is the same object i saw taking off from our planet. wish i had an adult state of mind when i witnessed this event. either way it is burned into my memory.
content.summary: Front of my house, thought must be launching space shuttle today, later in life common sense made me realize this was not a u.S. launch between k.C, and independence missouri.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside smoking a cigarette on our porch and i noticed two strange lights in the sky about maybe a mile away that were moving but stayed within the same distance from each other. i was obviously freaked out, so i went onto the sidewalk to see if it was still moving and i couldn't find it. after that, my boyfriend pointed out two other ones going into the same direction. this happened a few times. every time, we paid close attention to them. after moving slowly for a while, they just disappeared. as silly as that sounds. we waited outside and thought it was over with, but about 3 or 4 minutes later, we saw 2 more. i knew when i saw it that it wasn't a plane because planes don't look like that, even at night. we were going through all of the possibilities such as drones and whatnot. i was scared, so i looked up ufo sightings and saw something really similar to what we saw which led me to report it because i'm still scared. the object was circular, from what i could see, but it had a red/orange glow to it. i don't know if this is enough information or not, and i apologize if it's not. i would just really like someone to let me know what just happened.
content.summary: Saw around 9 consecutive lights during a 10 minute period, and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on melrose ave around 6pm pst, when i noticed in the sky a strange color of blue flashing light, i thought that is a strange color for a helicopter or plane, then it disappeared or the lights went off and reappeared in a different location, as you can see in the video there were no clouds in the sky at the time. i watched it for a few minute and then it disappeared, i don't know if it was a ufo or a helicopter but i didn't hear any sound of a helicopter, it made no sound.  i was very interested in this and if i wasn't heading to a meeting i would have followed it and checked it out more.  

thank you
content.summary: It was a blue flashing light that changed direction and would disappear and then reappear.

content.detailedDescription: Walking down driveway to house,  i heard loud millitary type hellicopters and looked up.  i could not see the helicopters initially,  but saw a very bright orb of light flying across the sky.  then, i saw the two helicopters flying single file behind it.  i could hear the helicopters,  but no sound from the light.  the light was very bright and steady.  the distance between the helicopters and orb would change,  but i could not tell if the orb was speeding up or if the helicopters were slowing down.  i ran through the house to the backyard and was able to see them fly off towards the southwest,  until my view was blocked by the treeline. when i first noticed the object,  i had no idea what it was,  and still don't.  i immediately noticed how incredibly bright it was and that it had no standard safety lights.  it was just the most incredibly bright, round light i have ever seen.  it was the weirdest thing i have ever seen,  not to mention the helicopters following closely behind it
content.summary: 2 helicopters following very bright orb or light

content.detailedDescription: Two out of the three people in my vehicle were fulltime city firefighters. third was a friend. we went on fishing trips every year. the year of the encounter, we were fishing stoney lake, ontario, canada, just outside of peterborough. we were on our way back to the lodge at 11pm-12am. calm, windless, clear, warm, summer night. heading down a pitch black backroad with no streetlights. as vehicle was moving at approx 60-70 km/hr, a light from above was projected over the vehicle, for about three seconds. all three of us noticed, but remained silent and continued driving. what seemed to be 10-20 seconds later, the light projected over the vehicle again, for the same duration, then went out. we skidded to a stop and were confused, afraid, and shocked at what just happened. we looked at eachother as if we had seen a ghost. out of the three o us, i am the only one willing to openly admit to what we experienced.
content.summary: Two separate, sustained beams of light, projected at my vehicle, seconds apart, three people in vehicle witnesed

content.detailedDescription: It was 7 am may 8 2014. i was on my back porch taking pic's of the sun in negative spectrum because of all the talk about planet x. after taking 15 to 20 pic's i decided to take a look to see if there was anything worth looking at. after looking at a few pic's i noticed what looked like a scratch in one of the pic's but seeing how all the pic's were taken with my lg g flex phone there's no way there couldbe a scratch in the pic. i magnified the several of the pic's and there is no way that its a meteor or an air plane. my dad was in the air force so i do no what planes look like and different types. i have two different pic's im sending you and would like to no my self what theses anomalies are. the pic's im sending will need to be magnified in order to see what i captured on digital pic's.
content.summary: Taking pic's of sun in negative spectrum with my lg g flex phone

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start by saying i can't believe i'm even doing this
, but i have no other explanations to what i saw this evening. i was outside on my deck 
smoking with ny boyfriend( who couldn't focus on the objecking at the moon. from the second i saw the object moving i thought i was going crazy. u wiped my eyes, glimmer. looked away and then back and still saw the object moving across the any. it looked like it was a very large object at a very far distance. it was so small you could compare it to maybe a penny. or a pea. it seemed ti be moving higher and towards the east. white, round and appeared to have a halo of lights around it that either googled or discuss or circled around it. faster than any jet or aircrafft i've ever seen. after a few moments the or as just give. nowhere to be seen at all. i've always held a small interest in  the thought of e.T beings but i'm honestly just freaked out by what i've seen. i thought i might as well share my short.
content.summary: Glowing orb traveling across sky at high speed. no trail. just disappeared after minute and half

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard and saw a large object very high in the sky. it first caught my attention in my peripheral vision. i turned to observe it thinking it may be a hawk or large bird. but it's movements where unlike any bird i have seen. and i grew up in the country. it hovered for about 3 minutes sometimes dropping its elevation rapidly a couple of times. it then became a sphere and dropped at an extremely rapid rate. my first thought was that it may be a bird hunting. but it's movements didn't seem natural too me. i have witnessed a few other sphere's at night east of my area that hover and the either ascend or descend rapidly out of sight.
content.summary: I witnessed a dark object out of the corner of my eye. when i was observing it the object was hovering for a few moments and then turned to a ball shape and descended at a very rapid rate.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to back yard patio to star gaze. happened to notice it in my peripheral vision, much like trying to see a dim star. you  can't see it as well as when looking away from it. didn't know what it was when i first saw it. i live in tia traffic area. can't help but see air craft every 5 to fifteen minutes mostly outbound passing here at about 10,500 ft. agl.Also have traffic on final approach to runway 18l  going to clearwater st. pete airport
this was nothing like that. this was also heading about 75 degrees at high altitude making no noise. if it was a jet it would be to high and far off to hear anyway. i have read of people describing seeing something like looking at cellophane, transparent, or cloaking. this seemed to be a large object with many small lights. it moved smoothly like a large airliner. this was many miles from me at the time. all lights were dim white lights not flashing. seemed to be delta or sting ray shaped. it had to be several times the size of a c-5. sighting lasted about 10 seconds. object left my vision as it moved out of sight because of neighbors tree. weather was warm, dead calm, no clouds or moon. i believe that this object was very hard to notice unless looking for it. wife was with me at the time. but after the last ufo i saw with her i didn't point this one out to her. never hear the end of it. why would they be here? why not contact us? etc. that ufo i didn't report. will make one if you wish and forget the religious lectures i went through
content.summary: I saw something in my periphial vision, seemed to be many dim lights on a large object

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on my deck it was around 10 pm last saturday night and i was looking over at the next street over from my house i saw an egg shape craft with two round white lights on the back of the craft as it was moving away from me the white lights had a red circle of light around the white lights they were not blinking and the craft made no sound at all it just ascended up over the roof top of one of the houses on the next street over from my house and up and over the tree top then it was gone. i knew it was not a plane or a helicoptor they do not fly that low and they make noise this was totally silent. i couldn't believe what i saw and was wondering if anyone else had seen it too as i live in a very populated area in the heart of downtown gloucester, ma. i'm not sure what it was but it was something i know i have never seen before! it lasted about 1 or 2 minutes then i lost sight of it once it had cleared the tree top. i wasn't scared looking at it i was just very curious as to what it was. i had no time to grab my camara to snap a picture of it or to wake up my daughter for her to see it.
content.summary: Egg shape craft

content.detailedDescription: Hiking while vacationing in the white mountains and during an extreme snowstorm.  while stopping for a rest were taking pictures hovering around us which seemed strange since they were landing at our feet and just feet away from us in the branches.  i took several pictures of the birds including sample of just tree branches in error.  upon reviewing the pictures later i noticed the strange object sitting on a branch which i cannot explain norcum my wife who was with me that day.  beyond this picture the only notable thing that was happening at the time was the odd nature of the birds.  we did return to this exact site months later in order to see if this object might have been some sort of camera or device set in these same branches but found nothing and no evidence of any human intervention.
content.summary: Took picture of without knowing, during a hike in mountains

content.detailedDescription:
5:50 am, may 3,cocoa beach,fl
when i first saw it i thought that it was a dark cloud going upward.  i was sitting up in bed looking through a 4ft wide glass door toward the ocean.It was wider than the glass door.  i first saw it through the railings on our balcony which is on the 3rd floor.  from the viewing position the width of the glass was appx 0.4 radians.  therefore if the object was 100ft away it would have been greater than 40ft in width.  realizing that it wasnot a cloud, i jumped out of bed, grabbed my glasses and went out onto the balcony.  the convex top of the object was above the floor of the balcony and below the level of the balcony railing(24ft above ground) and moving slowly upward.  the object continued to move up slowly past me until it was above the level of the balcony ceiling.  it was close enough that i felt that i could almost touch it, but it was probably within 100ft away.  it stopped at that level for a few (maybe 10 to 20) seconds and then moved south and up at an angle of appx 30 degrees at an extremely high rate of speed with a soft "swish".  it again stopped at the bottom of the low clouds for a few seconds and then moved east and up into the clouds at a moderate rate of speed.  
it first appeared to be a roundish disc about 25% as high as wide, with a convex top and with 6 large notches along the visible edge.  as it was directly in front of me, it was wider than my direct field of view.  looking directly at it i did not see either end of it.  there was no discernible sound above the level of the surf sounds when the object was hovering.  when it was some distance south of me there seemed to be 2 or 3 angular protrusions from at least one side.   
as i was looking at this object i was astounded and amazed but not frightened at all.  i was also screaming for my husband to "get up" which he did but only after it had disappeared into the clouds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A solid dark roughly circular object hovering less than 100ft in front of me at the altitude of my 3rd floor condo

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second time i see this type of event. first it looks like a moving star. after a few seconds of observing the moving light (normal star shine) it increases its brightness by 3- 5 times (brighter then the north star by 3-5 times). it looks like the object is boosting their speed and then vanish after a while because the light gets dimmer and dimmer until it vanishes from sight. the sky was very clear, no clouds.

i don't know of any natural causes for this type of event but if you know what may cause this please let me know? i would really like to know.

unfortunately i did not have my phone with me to record any video of it again . it seems like it knows when to show it self :))
content.summary: First it looks like a moving star. after a while it get very bright.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to a control room behind a steel gaging mill. i sometimes went there during lunch to meditate.  i kept getting the feeling to open my eyes as i sat in a little phone booth sized alcove next to the dc drive panel. when i opened them this red alien head peaked out from the corner of the panel at me. i was unafraid because i have seen things far more incredible than this. i said ok, lets see what happens next. next he side stepped out in front of me in full view kinda with a lilting step quite humorous i thought. i looked at him and said " if you can show up like this here then you already know who i am, what im doing in here, and what i stand for"  then i found myself standing up close enough to shake hands with him and i told him before you leave id like to ask you for a favor. i dont know if this can be done or should be done but if you could do something to throw a wet blanket on the ridicule i recieve here id appreciate it. with that he dissappeared. 
 the very next night i went back into that room hoping to see him again because after such experiences like this you think of other things you'd like to ask of them. i got an instant feeling to go outside. so i did and there sat my number one ridiculer eric arniel. i grabbed a chair setting there and went over to him and said hi eric and he said hello whats up? as i sat down i said eric you'd better strap your seat belt on because something incredible is about to happen, (as i said this im asking myself huh? it is? why are you saying this) eric then said " what? like some of your alien bullshit?" i said to eric," can you see that red star?" as i pointed to it, and eric leaned over and said " yea" and that was the last thing eric said for about ten minutes because that red star immediately began coming straight for us and as it came it changed its colors from red thru every color of the rainbow in order, until it was about 30 feet to 40 feet above us brilliant white, i looked at eric and his jaw was hanging open. then after hovering there for a few minutes it went backwards once again going thru the colors of the rainbow in order until it hit green then it went out like someone had flipped a switch and it was gone. the night sky was perfectly clear. 
 eric never again ridiculed me and eric got to see things very incredible that i did because of my meditation practices and seeking of the truth.
content.summary: There were two, on successive nights both connected.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home traveling on hwy 55 south coming up on the pevely exit when i noticed a white light in front of me shoot across the sky like a shooting star, change direction moving fast across the sky, change direction in a swirling motion, move to the left, hover for a short amount of time, turn blue and drop straight down below the hillside and out of sight.
content.summary: White light shot across the sky turned 190 degrees and descended.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:30 ish i saw what looked like a chinese paper balloon but a large one, it was slowly moving south east . it looked very strange and different then anything normal  so i yelled to my wife who looked out the window and saw it and ran back to get my binoculars . as she was gone it was about to go over the mountain beside our home but !!!!! it was not that high up even though it looked high and far it was closer and lower then i first thought because it was over the trees but on my side of the mountain and it was about half way up the mountain as my wife came back it was starting to vanish in the tree line then vanished behind the trees . my wife came out and was a bit freaked out and we talked about it and figured it must have been a large chinese balloon ( not sure what they are called )and it ran out of heat and crashed into the trees,at which  my wife reentered the house and i went to finish mowing the grass by our pool  all of the sudden my wife comes running out and is waving her arms trying to get my attention ! well it ascended again from behind the trees and continued se again we watched it for a very short time then it blinked out, it just vanished . a few seconds later it reappeared but much further se then it was before, it now seemed to be moving to the left and right slowly  all of the sudden moving nw back towards our home and once again  blinked out,  reappeared once again closer towards our home but a bit n this time and as we watched it, it seemed to vanish but with a sort of  streak as if it moved away at such high speed it left a trail of lite behind it, again  heading se  we got a  bit of video of it ,that  my wife took !!  i can say it was no more then 120 yards away at the closest point and it was weird because it looked further away then it was colors changing slightly on it but i could not make out the structure behind the lights .All that i could say was that it looked square or rectangular with a redish glow  it was silent and fluid in its movement, and it lowered itself behind trees and was there for a few minutes , its unknown to me whether it touched ground or not.  the video is on an i phone and will have to be sent to an email
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a very large chinese hot air paper balloon

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work, got off hwy 55 south at the richard rd exit and was stopped at the light ready to make a left turn for the gas station for coffee.  while at the light i saw an airplane flying north and a pattern of 6-7 lights moving south at what seemed to be 100x faster than the airplane.  the lights were golf ball size appearance in the sky at low altitude.  i don't know the color of the lights i am colored blind.
content.summary: Pattern of 6-7 lights traveling south extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first noticed i was in my car driving towards the west. i noticed out my driver side window seemed to be just above horizon bright yellow orange just above trees to the south. my 4 children saw. we continued driving in that direct for 10 miles then entered the city of modesto & lost track of it for about and hour. on our way home headed east we spotted it again this time seemed following us in easterly direction but had moved in horizon because now visible out my windshield. when arrived home saw it hovering seemed lower than the planes we see from time to time on horizon but bright as a star but it seemed to move up and down vertically without moving horizontally the way a plane would. at first i thought it might be a helicopter but it was silent. it was also much brighter than a helicopter. 

this is not mine or my family's first sighting. we have had life long encounters. but this is my first photo & first report. this sighting occurred nightly for nearly 2 weeks. i lost several hours in time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb light on horizon that seemed to follow my car for 20 miles

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my parents and running late for an event that we had planned.  i was driving from the raymond area down 102 through chester heading towards derry. i saw it above the road close to the big tower with the red light on it. it was dusk and i could see this object pretty clearly.  it looked like a series of over grown ping pong balls that were the size of a tennis ball.  they were strung together via a link of rods and looked similar to an over grown version of a model that a chemist would make. they looked like all one piece. they had a faint glow. the reason it struck my curiosity was because instead of just falling from the sky, it was just floating down gently as if catching a breeze.  there were other cars in front and back of me that most likely saw it too.  i kind of blew it off because i thought that maybe it was a weather testing thing that the state or federal govt. was using.  later that night (some time between 12am and 2 am) i drove by the same area where the object was floating down towards and i saw an unusually bright pulsing light.  i don't know if it was related but i travel that road often and have never seen it before in my over 20 years of traveling that route.  the light was so bright that it lit up the street like day time.  i was afraid to drive up the side road to see what it was.  i continued down 102 and spoke to the police officer who was on duty that night, he was sitting in his cruiser near chester center.  i told him of it and he seemed very disinterested.  he stated that there is always a light near that tower.  actually, he was right...It is a small red light, but this was a giant white pulsating light.  i don't think he investigated it.  i am not sure.  a few days later i was driving route 102 again.  i decided to cut thru the side road to the tower and see if i could see anything.  i was across from the field where the incident occurred and saw a neighbor  out in the yard.  i told him of the situation and he stated he didn't see any big light.
content.summary: Floating balls on long straight rods that ended in abnormally large strobe light

content.detailedDescription: The images were captured by 1 of my wildlife cameras. i only check the cameras about once a week roughly. the 2 moultrie cameras i have are very sensitive ( they capture shade movements on the ground from trees, blades of tall grass blowing and other things that my other wildlife camera does not capture ) for this reason sometimes i have anywhere between 500 and 2,000 images to look through. i have always made it a habit to look through each and every photo just to make sure i don't miss anything exciting. on this past saturday ( may 10, 2014 ) i went up to check my 3 cameras and came back home to view the photos on my laptop as usual. i found a series of photos it captured on may 7 2014 at 11:44 a.M. interesting. there were a couple before and a couple after the actual photo with the object but i only kept 3 photos, the one right before, the actual object photo and the photo snapped right after the object is captured. unfort. when i zoom in to try and view the object better the photo becomes blurry and hard to see clearly what the object is. although it is blurry you can cleary see the object is blimp / egg shaped. it is white/grey on the top and the bottom appears to be a darker color , kind of purple colored. i am not trying to claim this is a ufo but i do not know what it is.Since it is only captured on photo not video i do not know if it was flying , if it actually landed or just what its motion was. i am hoping your organization can give us some insight into what the object could possibly be. thank you for your time and consideration.
content.summary: Series of photos captured on 1 of my wildlife cameras. attached 3 photos taken all in the same minute.

content.detailedDescription: Just left a friends house around midnight and saw quite a few aircrafts lined up in formation going pretty slow not blinking at all so me and my buddy shrugged it off. when we got back to my other friends house i look up and see crafts just shooting all over the place changing direction and went back in in side. around 2am i went back outside by myself and just watched all these events happen. i started videoing around 4 am on my crappy cell phone which i cant take the videos off. luckly i noticed that around 5 am and got another crappy cell and took these videos. you might have to scroll in and really look to see to see all of the activity in the night time ones. i had two day time ones but when i plugged my phone in to put the videos on my computer my computer shut off and the videos were gone off my phone. about 5 minutes later i checked again and they were back on my phone minuse the first day time video. anyway the video11 is the one to watch over and over and over again. they mess with my phone off and on through out it.
content.summary: Almost looked like a war so many

content.detailedDescription: Very terrifying, i was absolutely shaking, i was leaving the grocery store and they're were some people in they're cars parked in the middle of the road half out they're car doors staring at the sky, so when i looked up i saw the ufo and was in shock, and i'll never forget it, it was like a disc. with a dome, it was throwing out blue light, and then changed shape like into a spiral, then took off
content.summary: Very terrifying

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were in a field located at a local church in fairfax, va. i was gazing at the stars above when i noticed a stationary star like object descend at incredible speeds to who knows where. with the speed this object had descended, i had no doubt in my mind it was et in nature. i was not at first amazed since i had seen 5 different types of ariel phenomena prior to the incident. it was then that we all saw a star like object just appear out of thin air, yes thin air, and begin a straight flight path. we quickly noticed that the object did not have any blinkers or distinctive man made traits to it whatsoever. the object then started to change densities and momentarily vanished, only to reappear again further from where originally spotted. the reason i know it had changed densities is because when it disappeared, i was still able to see it clearly through my 3rd eye even though my friends had believed to loose sight of it.(no this is no joke, i have been training myself to see higher frequency like anomalies for the past couple of years). we would then see this object appear and disappear, flying in a straight path, and began to notice more star like objects fill up the sky.At first the emotion i felt was, instinctively fear. but when i stopped allowing myself to fear what i did not know, i immediately felt a warm feeling of love entering my body.  from the time period of 1-4 am (eastern time) we had seen about 4-5 different aerial phenomena occurring. it was only when night had ended and day was starting that we did not see any more star like objects in the sky. this has just been one encounter witnessed by my friends and i, and can assure much more to come since we have seen them consistently every night since the start of the month of may.
content.summary: Descended with incredible speed,able to shift density,not man made.

content.detailedDescription: Me and the wife were on our patio enjoying the evening before i went into work when she noticed a black disc that just seemed to hover quite a ways above and past the treeline over lake lewisville in denton county texas.We observed this object change shape at least 5 times before lowering some sort of appendage from the bottom of it.It was then that i realized i was witnessing something quite unusual,so i ran in the house and grabbed my camera and shot two pictures of it as it silently moved northeast out of my view.It wss certainly surreal and i look forward to someone analyzing my pictures.Picture 1 and 2 or 44 and 45 as i took them are of the object.Number one was taken with no zoom.Number 2 is zoomed in all the way and the by the 3rd picture the object has moved past the treeline and i've included it for perspective.I was just gonna leave this subject alone,but it's literally keeping my up tonight so here goes.Thanks
content.summary: Ufo hovered over lake lewisville in texas and extended appendage.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:40pm, i went outside to walk my dog.  i looked up at the sky and noticed a star-like object in the low northeastern sky.  it was dark amber or red in color.  i thought it was mars at first because it's been very noticeable in the sky lately.  but i realized it wasn't quite in the right spot to be mars, and this object seemed to be close.  then this orb started dropping multiple slightly smaller orbs.  it was dropping them continuously for what seemed like a minute or two?  they were the same color.  they were dropping straight down as if falling to the ground, but i can't tell if they actually landed because they were too far in the distance.  as they fell lower, they got dimmer.  one car was driving down my street and i started pointing up at the sky, but i don't think the person noticed me.  the main orb stopped dropping the smaller orbs, and it slowly got dimmer and smaller till i could barely see it at all.  it moved upwards.  then it's light came back and dropped a few more smaller orbs that did exactly the same as before.  then the main orb got dim again, and it appeared to be moving away in distance slowly getting more dim until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Reddish orange orb dropped smaller orbs that fell straight down

content.detailedDescription:
I was upstairs in my room and my mom downstairs called for me and said the dog is acting weird come quick. i cam downstairs and the dog was panting really really hard and confused. my mom had said the dog was just laying there unresponsive with her tounge out and she was calling the dogs name but she wasnt doing anything. when she pants that means she has to use the bathroom. im not sure if this part had any connection at all. she said she never saw the dog like this before and it scared her that she was having some sort of stroke or something.

i took the dog out in my backyard, i am in the middle of the city in cleveland ohio. it was about 1220am midnight. we just cut down a giant tree in our backyard 2 days ago so i have a great view of the sky. everyday i take my dog out i often record or look at the stars. as my dog was sniffing around i looked in the sky and saw a beam of light

for a split second i thought bottle rocket but this was huge and made no noise. it glowed from nothing to glowing up so bright that you could see either fog or the clouds around it. i also thought maybe shooting star but it was going fast. it was not falling either it shot like a laser beam. i also thought of dragonfly right away by the way it moved, but it went straight it didnt flutter. the back end of it seemed like tiny wings like a dragon fly that was reverse but the wings werent very big. it appeared and glowed like a firework almost and then immediately the glow went out and it dissapeared but was huge. it was like a long rectangle similar to the kind in the game tetris except this was just glowing. i could not see any sort of detail like any sort of windows it was just a long glowing perfect long rectangle and it was very fast 2 to 3 seconds it appeared and dissapeared like the speed of light. matter of fact the way a lightning bolt appears and dissapears would be a similar explanation but this was a perfect object and alot faster.
content.summary: Glowing rectangle beam appeared for 2-3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stayed at a campground in rio grande, nj for the summer in a tent and worked on the boardwalk in the wildwoods. we had gotten home after work and were hanging out in the campground's open field at about 1:00 am. i was the first to see the objects flying patterns in the sky and after watching them for a brief time i asked my wife to describe what she saw and was certain that she was seeing the exact happenings that i was. hundreds of starlike objects in one formation flew intricate military like flight patterns from horizon to horizon, they flew in perfect synchronization changing direction and speed. after a few minutes of us both describing to each other what we were watching the objects separated into multiple groups and flew different patterns in quadrants each group was still in perfect synch with their group. then they reunited into one formation and zoomed away beyond our visibility. at first i thought it could be a laser light show since it was the jersey shore 4th of july week. but after realizing how clear the sky was and the intricacy of the maneuvers they flew we knew that what were witnessing was awesomely beyond anything we had ever seen and would be impossible for the technology of 1975.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hundreds   starlike dots flew intricate militaristic patterns splitting into quadrants flying varied flight patterns horizon to horizon perfectly synchronized then in one formation zoomed away

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at 19:40 letting the dogs out. there was a bad storm on the way. my son and i looked up and noticed there was a think black cloud under the higher gray clouds. the black cloud formed into a bat shape and looked like it was made of black smoke webbing. it was completely different from the other fluffy light gray clouds above it.  directly above our house,  no higher than 600 feet, there was a very long dark gray/black swirly cloud. it looked like a football stadium long dragon with a fish tail, it undulated from side to side. on its sides were long silver smooth strips that looked like vents.  there was a large round area 3/4 towards the end which had a circular opening in its center. when i looked up into the hole i could see light gray clouds above. the longer i watched, the more paranoid i started to feel. my dogs got very agitated. i went inside to get my cellphone, but it didn't record. whatever it was, it seemed to be organic. it reminded me of those long dragons you see in the chinese celebrations. the larger portions looked webbed. very freaky. at first i was in awe, but when the circular opening was directly overhead i got a horrible sense of panic.
content.summary: Snake-shaped undulating dark gray/black cloud traveled from south to north directly overhead
